user.delete_admins: Assign a new admins to continue.
user.delete_check: Before deleting your account, ensure you are not the only admin of any boards or workspaces.
user.delete_warn: WARNING: Account deletion is permanent. You will not be able to recover your account.
user.only_admin: You cannot delete your account while being the only admin in a board or workspace. Please designate a new admin first.
